sentences.sContent: In fact, this monster is not a narwhal, but a wonderful submarine structure.
sentences.sContent_eng: In fact, this monster is not a narwhal, but a wonderful submarine structure.
sentences.sCn: 其实这怪物并非什么独角鲸， 而是一艘构造奇妙的潜水艇。

sentences.sContent: If we could, we would look for an Australian-designed and -built submarine, but of course we would look at options as well.
sentences.sContent_eng: If we could, we would look for an Australian-designed and -built submarine, but of course we would look at options as well.
sentences.sCn: 如果可以，我们会采用澳大利亚自主设计和制造的潜水艇，当然我们同样也会考虑其他方案。

sentences.sContent: Because of the enormous responsibility they hold, it is imperative that submarine commanders are masters of themselves as well as their vessels and crew.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because of the enormous responsibility they hold, it is imperative that submarine commanders are masters of themselves as well as their vessels and crew.
sentences.sCn: 由于负有重大责任，潜水艇上的指挥员们不仅要控制住自己而且还要指挥好他们的舰艇和全体船员。

phrases.pCn: 海底扇；海底陆源沉积扇；海底扇形地
潜入式浇口；潜伏浇口；下浇口

remMethod.val: sub (在下面) + marine (海洋) → 在海洋下面 → 水下的， 海底的

words.tran: 能潜水的；能沉入水中的
能浸入水中的；可潜入水中的
潜入水中（submerge的过去分词）；使陷入
